playeramount_2: 2 Players||Two players will turn against each other. This is basically a head-to-head session between you and your opponent.
playeramount_4: 4 Players||Up to 4 players are going to play this one. Players can team up with others. If all players belong to one team, they'll all turn against each other.
board_0: Left / 1P||When you start a 2-player session, your board will be on the left side. In a 4-player mode, you'll be using the 1st board. This board position is much commonly used by players.
board_1: Right / 2P||When you start a 2-player session, your board will be on the right side. In a 4-player mode, you'll be using the 2nd board.
board_2: Left / 3P||When you start a 2-player session, your board will be on the left side. In a 4-player mode, you'll be using the 3rd board.
board_3: Right / 4P||When you start a 2-player session, your board will be on the right side. In a 4-player mode, you'll be using the 4th board. If there are 3 players and you pick the 4th board, you'll be automatically using the 3rd board.
board_0o: Left / 1P||When you start a 2-player session, your board will be on the left side. This board position is much commonly used by players.
board_1o: Right / 2P||When you start a 2-player session, your board will be on the right side.
mode_gachatris: Gachatris||A type/mode made of blocks, with 7 Gachaquadrominoes consisting of 4 Gachaminoes or blocks each that resemble a letter. The goal is to clear lines by filling rows.
mode_Linkblobs: Gachae Linkblobs||A type/mode where Blobs are in and 3-5 colors exist. Blobs are soft and round objects whose goal is to connect 4 or more of them of the same color, making a chain.
mode_random: Random Mode||Gachatris or Linkblobs? Let the roulette decide!
insane_frenzy: Frenzy||Enhancement state mode made for Gachatris whose goal is to clear lines to complete preset maps; the phase number increases as you complete maps, making the next map become more difficult that you might think.
insane_fever: Fever||Enhancement state mode made for Gachae Linkblobs whose goal is to match the length of a chain triggered at once with the length of a chain required by a ready-made setup. Doing so or even extending will increase the required chain length by 1 or so; otherwise will decrease it by up to 2.
insane_micro: Micro-blob||Enhancement/transformation state mode made for Gachae Linkblobs that functions the same as the normal Fever mode but with smaller Blobs; it's faster than normal when blobs vanish.
insane_macro: Macro-blob||Enhancement/transformation state mode made for Gachae Linkblobs that functions differently than Micro-blob; it is so large that the goal is to stack up the number of chains, hence "combo".
bg_black: Black||Black background... It will look blank and does not have animations to play in the background.
bg_neoplexus1: Arcturlens Neoplexus||This is the fusion core landmark sitting on a sea near the land where universes of Gachatris and Linkblobs merge together.
